data.name: Shootout on Cash Island Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Shootout on Cash Island game original soundtrack includes 9 excellent retro tunes created by Andrzej 'Grogon' Dobrowolski.


            


            01 Waterside
            02 Summer Hit
            03 Blast
            04 Soundset
            05 Taxi Boat
            06 Sound Dunes
            07 Mine and Landmine
            08 Jet Set Explode
            09 Driller Returns
